examples: the conservative views of his parents
las opiniones conservadoras de sus padres
music which is accessible to an audience with extremely conservative tastes
música accesible a un público con gustos extremadamente conservadores
The southern state's inhabitants tend to be socially conservative.
Los habitantes del estado sureño tienden a ser socialmente conservadores.
Her style of dress was never conservative.
Su estilo de vestir nunca fue conservador.
